description:
Komlin III was the third robot made and piloted by http://anidb.net/ch7365 [Komui Lee], in his attempt to destroy http://anidb.net/ch32515 [Russell] when he believed that Russell and his sister were dating. It ended up leveling part of the town and, ultimately, got kicked and destroyed by http://anidb.net/ch7123 [Lenalee].
Source: D.Gray-man Wiki, edited.
name: Komlin III
